name: Avoid Main Procedures having SQL queries using NOT EXISTS (PL1)
description: This rule searches for all PL1 Main Procedures having SQL queries using NOT EXISTS.
output:
The report lists all the PL1 Main Procedures having SQL queries using NOT EXISTS.

It provides following information: 
-  PL1 Main Procedures full name
rationale: A NOT operator in a WHERE clause does not allow to use database indexes and has an impact in terms of performance. It is better to invert the logical expression in data selection.
remediation: Review the SQL queries and not use NOT EXISTS anymore.

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - SQL and Data Handling Performance
